cards.title: Soulbinder
body: Conduit Surge
setup: At the start of the game, shuffle the hero deck and draw 4 cards.

Put one of the character cards for {SoulshardOfLightningCharacter}, {SoulshardOfMercuryCharacter}, and {SoulshardOfIronCharacter} into play, active side up. Put the rest of the character cards under this card.
gameplay: When {SoulshardOfLightningCharacter}, {SoulshardOfMercuryCharacter}, or {SoulshardOfIronCharacter} would be incapacitated, first put one of the other cards under this card into play.
If you have no active heroes in play, flip this card.
powers: One of your targets deals 1 Target 3 Infernal Damage and themselves 1 Infernal Damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: This place's aura is unique. I won't have you disturbing it.

cards.title: Soulbinder
cards.gameplay: When this card is flipped, first remove all of your other Character Cards from play.
powers: Draw 1 card. Remove 1 Ritual Token from a Ritual.

cards.title: Soulshard of Lightning
cards.gameplay: Increase damage dealt by this card to non-Hero targets by 1.

cards.title: Soulshard of Mercury
cards.gameplay: At the end of your turn, you may discard a card to draw a card.

cards.title: Soulshard of Iron
cards.gameplay: Reduce damage dealt to this card by non-Hero targets by 1.

cards.title: Clay Soulsplinter
body: When this card enters play, you may play a One-Shot or a Ritual.

cards.title: Wooden Soulsplinter
body: When this card enters play, you may play a One-Shot or a Ritual.
powers: Each of your Hero targets regains 2 HP.

cards.title: Straw Soulsplinter
body: When this card enters play, you may play a One-Shot or a Ritual.
powers: One of your Targets deals 1 Target 2 Toxic Damage and regains 2 HP.

cards.title: Ritual of Catastrophe
body: When this card enters play, place 3 Ritual Tokens on it.
At the end of your turn, remove 1 Ritual Token from this card.
When the last token is removed from this, each non-Hero target deals itself 3 irreducible Infernal Damage. Then, destroy this card.

cards.title: Ritual of Salvation
body: When this card enters play, place 3 Ritual Tokens on it.
At the end of your turn, remove 1 Ritual Token from this card.
When the last token is removed from this, each Hero target regains 3 HP and each player draws a card. Then, destroy this card.

cards.title: Ritual of Transferrence
body: When this card enters play, place 3 Ritual Tokens on it.
At the end of your turn, remove 1 Ritual Token from this card.
When the last token is removed from this, up to 3 Targets regain 2 HP and 1 Target deals itself irreducible Toxic damage equal to the total amount of HP regained this way. Then, destroy this card.

cards.title: Ritual of Knowledge
body: When this card enters play, place 3 Ritual Tokens on it.
At the end of your turn, remove 1 Ritual Token from this card.
When the last token is removed from this, you may draw 4 cards, you may play a card, and you may use a power. Then, destroy this card.

cards.title: Ritual Components
powers: Deal 1 Target 2 Infernal Damage. Remove 1 Ritual Token from 1 of your Ritual Cards.

cards.title: Arcane Detonation
body: 1 of your targets deals each non-Hero target and themselves 3 Infernal Damage.

cards.title: Sacrificial Rite
body: 1 of your targets deals 1 target and themselves 2 Infernal Damage.
Remove 1 Ritual Token from each of your Rituals.

cards.title: Keystone of Spirit
body: 1 of your targets deals 1 themselves 1 Infernal Damage.
Each other Hero Target regains 1 HP.
You may use a power now.

cards.title: Final Eruption
body: Select 1 of your Targets. It deals 1 Target Infernal Damage equal to its current HP plus 2.
Then, destroy the selected target.

cards.title: Blind Beckoning
body: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a copy of a Ritual. Put it in play.
One of your Targets deals 1 Target and themselves Infernal Damage equal to the number of Rituals in play.

dummyCards.title: Repeated Rites
body: When one of your Rituals would be destroyed, you may instead add 2 Ritual Tokens to it and destroy this card.

dummyCards.title: Reliquary
body: When this card enters play, you may put a card from under your Instructions card into play.
When one of your characters would be destroyed, you may instead restore it to 6 HP and destroy this card.
